section.title: Assigning Tags to a Template for Auto Approval

procedure.title: To Assign Tags to a Template for Auto Approval

step.para: Click the Templates accordion, and select the templates that you want to tag.
Select a customer tag from the first dropdown, and then a value for the tag.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The thresholds for automatic approval for a specific template are set. The next time a provision request is created for this template these thresholds will be checked. If the requirements are met, the provisioning request will be approved with no user intervention.
